title: Ronaldo goal-kick visuals for Cute Football mini-game

requirements.summary: Add Ronaldo kick/celebration/miss static images and update MiniGameCuteFootball to render them across idle/aiming, kick, and result states.
acceptanceCriteria: New images are added as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated using the filenames specified in this build request.
MiniGameCuteFootball renders a Ronaldo-kicking visual scene (player + goalpost) in place of or alongside the current ball/goal visuals.
When the player clicks "Kick!", the on-screen visuals clearly reflect a kick moment (e.g., player pose changes and/or ball movement) using the added images.
When the result is a goal, the on-screen visuals clearly reflect a successful shot into the goal (e.g., goal/celebration variant).
When the result is a miss, the on-screen visuals clearly reflect a miss (e.g., miss variant) without breaking existing game flow (attempts, goals, next kick, game over).

file_operations.description: Add the required static image asset: ronaldo-kick.dim_768x768.png.
Add the required static image asset: goalpost.dim_768x512.png.
Add the required static image asset: football-motion.dim_512x512.png.
Add the required static image asset: ronaldo-celebrate.dim_768x768.png.
Add the required static image asset: ronaldo-miss.dim_768x768.png.

Replace the current goal/ball visuals with a Ronaldo + goalpost scene using the new static assets at frontend/public/assets/generated/ronaldo-kick.dim_768x768.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/goalpost.dim_768x512.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/football-motion.dim_512x512.png; update rendering logic so idle/aiming shows Ronaldo readying the kick, clicking "Kick!" shows a kick moment (pose change and/or ball flight animation), and goal/miss result states swap to frontend/public/assets/generated/ronaldo-celebrate.dim_768x768.png or frontend/public/assets/generated/ronaldo-miss.dim_768x768.png while preserving existing attempts/goals/next kick/game over flow.

Add/adjust minimal global keyframes/utilities (e.g., a small ball-flight animation class) used by MiniGameCuteFootball to visually convey kick + goal/miss outcomes with the new static images, without altering game rules or editing frontend/src/components/ui.
